mentions.title: クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始
mentions.content: クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始 | デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社のプレスリリース PR TIMESのご利用について 資料をダウンロード クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣。多彩なカフェメニューとコーヒー豆の組み合わせが楽しめる「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン」 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 2025年4月14日 13時00分 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社(本社：東京都港区 代表取締役社長：甲斐ラース)は、 2024年12月16日から2025年3月7日までクラウドファンディングサイト“GREEN FUNDING/グリーンファンディング”にて支援募集をし、大好評(支援者数892人)を得た次世代モデル『デロンギ リヴェリア(Rivelia)全自動コーヒーマシン(EXAM44035/EXAM44055)』を、4月25日(金)より全国発売いたします。 デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、豊富なコーヒー・ミルクメニューを楽しめるだけでなく、デロンギ初の「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り換え式の2つの豆ホッパーにより、最大16種類*のメニューとお好みのコーヒー豆を手軽に組み合わせて、さらにコーヒーの楽しみ方が広がります。また、従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す洗練されたデザインを採用し、ぺブルグレー、サンドベージュ、オニキスブラックの3色を展開。どんなキッチンにも調和し、インテリアとしても美しく空間を演出します。*コーヒーモデルは8種類のメニューを搭載 デロンギ リヴェリアは、コーヒーの濃さや量などを自分好みに調整できるカスタマイズ機能を搭載し、抽出条件を登録すると時間帯に応じて自動で切り替わる「コーヒールーティン」機能も備えています。使い方も簡単で、上部のカラー液晶パネルでメニューを選択するだけ。直感的な操作で、こだわりの一杯をお楽しみいただけます。 本製品はクラウドファンディング期間中、全国各地で展示・試飲会を実施し、多くのお客様に実際にお試しいただきました。お客様からは、「実際に使ってみたら、期待以上に美味しく、操作も簡単だった」「2つの豆ホッパーがあり、デカフェの豆と入れ替えられるのも嬉しい」「操作が簡単で、スマホのように直感的に使える」といった声が多く寄せられました。また、「自動で内部洗浄してくれるのでお手入れがとてもラクそう」「カスタマイズ機能が豊富で、自分好みの一杯を簡単に作れる」と、機能面でも高い評価をいただきました。さらに、「ミルクメニューが8種類もあり、お店に行かなくても本格的なラテが楽しめる」「カフェで飲むようなふわふわのカプチーノがボタン一つで作れるのは感動的」と、充実したミルクメニューも好評。デザインについても、「スリムなサイズ感がキッチンになじみやすく、圧迫感がない」「他にはないカラー展開で、インテリアとしても映える」と、大変多くのお客様からご好評のお声をいただくことができました。 多彩なメニュー、自分好みに楽しめる豊富なスタマイズ機能、直感的な操作性を兼ね備えたデロンギ リヴェリアで、挽くたびに、特別な一杯を楽しめるコーヒーの新習慣をご堪能ください。 デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンの特長 ■最大16種類のメニューで自由自在な楽しみ方を実現 最大16種類のメニューを液晶画面からタッチするだけで挽きたて･淹れたてのカフェメニューを簡単にお楽しみいただけます。 ●ミルクメニュー 8種類：カプチーノ、カフェラテ、フラットホワイト、コルタード、エスプレッソマキアート、ラテマキアート、カプチーノMIX、ミルク ●コーヒーメニュー 8種類：エスプレッソ、アメリカーノ、カフェ・ジャポーネ、スペシャルティ、エスプレッソラージ、エスプレッソ(コールド)、アイスコーヒー、アメリカーノ(コールド) ミルクモデルのEXAM44055G/EXAM44055BGはミルクメニュー8種類とコーヒーメニュー8種類、合わせて16種類のメニューを搭載し、コーヒーモデルのEXAM44035Bはコーヒーメニュー8種類を搭載しています。 ■豆ホッパーで手軽にコーヒー豆を入れ替え コーヒー豆の入れ替えを可能にした「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り替え可能な豆ホッパーで、メニューに合わせてコーヒー豆の組み合わせを自分好みに多彩にお楽しみいただけます。 ■カプチーノやカフェラテなどミルクメニューも全自動(EXAM44055のみ) デロンギ独自の自動ミルク泡立て技術「ラテクレマ™ホット」は、ミルクが最も甘くなる60～65℃の温度で抽出し、ミルクと泡の黄金比(2:3)を実現し、カフェのように美味しく仕上げます。コーヒーの抽出からフォームミルクの注入まで全て自動で、メニューに合わせて3段階のミルクの泡に調整可能。きめ細かく舌触り滑らかな泡の本格的なミルクメニューがワンタッチで楽しめます。牛乳のほか豆乳など植物性ミルクにも対応しています。 ※コーヒーモデルEXAM44035Bは、スチームフロッサーが付属しています。 ■革新的で洗練されたデザインとスタイリッシュなカラー 従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す、革新的で洗練されたデザインとインテリアとしてどんなスタイルのキッチンにも映えるスタイリッシュなカラーを採用。EXAM44035Bは定番で人気のブラックカラー(オニキスブラック)、EXAM44055G/EXAM44055BGは本体に新色(ペブルグレー、サンドベージュ)を採用し、キッチンをスタイリッシュで優雅に彩ります。 ■カスタマイズ・パーソナライズ機能であなた好みの極上の一杯を メニューごとにコーヒーの豆量、コーヒーやミルクの抽出量を設定できるカスタマイズ機能とカスタマイズしたメニューを最大四つのプロフィールに登録できるパーソナライズ機能を搭載。お気に入りのメニューと味わいをいつでも簡単に抽出できます。また、朝・昼・夕方の時間帯ごとに設定した抽出量や豆量が自動的に切り替える「コーヒールーティン」機能により、ライフスタイルに合わせた味わいを手軽にお楽しみいただけます。 ■専用アクセサリでコールドミルクメニューまで楽しめる(EXAM44055のみ) 専用アクセサリ「ラテクレマクールアップグレードセット」に含まれる「ラテクレマ™クール」のミルクコンテナをマシンにセットするだけで、6種類のコールドミルクメニューがお楽しみいただけます。「ラテクレマ™クール」は、アロマを十分に引き出されたコーヒーが、氷と混ざり合ったときに最適な状態となる温度帯のスチーム・フォームミルクを作り出します。氷と混ぜた際に水っぽくならずに、ミルクの甘みをしっかりと感じる、おいしいコールドミルクメニューが楽しめます。 ●コールドのミルクメニュー 6種類 カプチーノ(コールド)、カプチーノMIX(コールド)、ラテマキアート(コールド)、カフェラテ(コールド)、フラットホワイト(コールド)、コールドミルク 【 製品情報 】 製品名： デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン 型式番号：EXAM44055G EXAM44055BG EXAM44035B 本体色：ペブルグレー(EXAM44055G) サンドベージュ(EXAM44055BG) オニキスブラック(EXAM44035B) 希望小売価格 ：オープン ペブルグレー：商品サイトはこちら サンドベージュ：商品サイトはこちら オニキスブラック：商品サイトはこちら デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、ビックカメラ、ヨドバシカメラ、デロンギ直営店（表参道店）とデロンギ公式オンラインショップ、デロンギ公式楽天市場店、デロンギ公式Yahoo! ショッピング店とAmazonでお求めいただけます。 ミルクモデル(EXAM44055G/ EXAM44055BG)専用アクセサリ「ラテクレマクールアップグレードセット」 同梱物：ラテクレマ™クールミルクコンテナ ダブルウォールグラス 400ml×2 ダブルウォールグラス 480ml×2 ラテクレマアップグレードセット 《新CM概要》 ・タイトル：「デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシン Perfetto コーヒーの新習慣篇」（30秒） ・TVCM放映開始日：2025年4月14日（月） ・TVCM放映エリア：沖縄を除く日本全国 ・主演：ブラッド・ピット（俳優） ・日本語ナレーション出演：津田健次郎（声優・俳優） ・制作チーム：ベネット・ミラー（監督）、ジャスティン・ ハーウィッツ（音楽） ▼新TVCM動画 デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンTVCM「デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシン Perfetto コーヒーの新習慣篇」 ※デロンギ・ジャパン公式YouTubeにて近日公開予定 デロンギのメンバーシッププログラム「De’Longhi Family」 デロンギ製品をご購入いただいたお客様に、安心して製品を長くご愛用いただくため、ご購入後のメーカー無償保証期間の延長、万が一の際の迅速な修理対応といったアフターケアを大幅に拡大し提供いたします。 また、メンバー限定の先行情報として、新商品やセールなどの最新情報もいち早くお届けいたします。 詳細はこちら ■GREEN FUNDINGとは 未来を企画する「デジタル上の見本市」として、革新的な製品が集まるプラットフォームを運用。CCCグループと連携し、ガジェット・雑貨・映画・出版・音楽・地域活性化など様々なジャンルのプロジェクトを掲載。現在5,400を超えるプロジェクト、総計155億円以上の資金調達をサポートしています。 ■デロンギ ― 進化し続けるブランド ― デロンギ(De’Longhi)は、20世紀前半より、イタリア北部の街トレヴィーゾでクラフトマンワークショップ（職人の作業場）としてスタートしたイタリアの家電ブランドです。1974年に、最初の電気機器であるオイルヒーターを製造し、工房から工場へと飛躍的に発展を遂げました。1990年代には、暖房器具の製造で使われる技術を用いて、コーヒーマシンの開発・製造にも参入。コーヒー市場に積極的に新しい製品を投入し続け、現在、全自動コーヒーマシンをはじめとするコーヒーマシン市場において世界的トップシェアを誇ります。 ■デロンギ・ジャパンについて デロンギ・グループの日本法人の「デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社」は1995年に設立。主な事業は、日本市場向け家庭用・業務用電気製品の輸入販売となり、以下分野の商品・付帯サービスを取り扱っています。 1. オイルヒーター、マルチダイナミックヒーター、パネルヒーター、ファンヒーター等の暖房機器および空気清浄機付きファン。 2. 全自動コーヒーマシン、エスプレッソ・カプチーノメーカー、ドリップコーヒーメーカー等のコーヒー機器。 3. ハンドブレンダー、フードプロセッサー、コンベクションオーブン、電気ケトル等の小型調理家電製品。 主力商品であるオイルヒーターは、2004年以来20年間、日本市場において販売台数・売上No.1※１の地位にあり、多くのお客様から支持され続けています。コーヒー機器分野でも、日本だけでなく世界各国でコーヒーメーカー売上No.１※2を獲得しており、優れた機能だけでなく、洗練された美しいデザイン性を備えたデロンギ製品は、世界の国と地域で愛されています。 ※1 独立調査機関調べ 2004年1月～2023年12月 日本国内数量・金額シェア ※2 独立調査機関調べ 2023年1月～12月 このプレスリリースには、 メディア関係者向けの情報があります メディアユーザーログイン 既に登録済みの方はこちら メディアユーザー新規登録 無料 メディアユーザー登録を行うと、企業担当者の連絡先や、 イベント・記者会見の情報など様々な特記情報を閲覧できます。 mentions.title: デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念　コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催
mentions.content: デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催 | デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社のプレスリリース PR TIMESのご利用について 資料をダウンロード デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催 イベント特典もご用意 六本木ヒルズカフェ/スペースで4月26日（土）・27日（日）の2日間 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 2025年4月14日 13時00分 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社（本社：東京都港区 代表取締役社長：甲斐ラース）は、全自動コーヒーマシンの次世代モデルとして、多彩なコーヒー・ミルクメニューとコーヒー豆の組み合わせで、さらに自分好みのコーヒー体験を楽しめる『デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン（EXAM44035B/EXAM44055G/EXAM44055BG）』(以下リヴェリア)を4月25日（金）に発売します。発売を記念して、新製品のお披露目とともに、実際に製品を使って淹れたての一杯を味わうことができる「挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」（参加無料・アンケート回答者対象、購入者対象の数量限定特典付き） を、4月26日（土）・ 27日（日）に六本木ヒルズカフェ/スペースで開催いたします。 デロンギの全自動コーヒーマシンは、豆から挽きたて淹れたて、極上の一杯をお届けすることにこだわっています。リヴェリアは、豊富なコーヒー・ミルクメニューを楽しめるだけでなく、デロンギ初の「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り換え式の2つの豆ホッパーにより、最大16種類*メニューとお好みのコーヒー豆を手軽に組み合わせて、さらにコーヒーの楽しみ方が広がります。また、従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す、革新的で洗練されたデザインを採用し、ぺブルグレー、サンドベージュ、オニキスブラックの3色を展開。どんなキッチンにも調和し、インテリアとしても美しい空間を演出します。*コーヒーモデルは8種類のメニューを搭載 本イベントはどなたでもご参加いただけ、コーヒーの奥深い世界を体験できる、デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタの石井護氏がおすすめするリヴェリアのメニューとムセッティ社のコーヒー豆のペアリングメニューをご紹介。タッチ＆トライ（操作体験）コーナーでは、実際にマシンを操作してその場で淹れたての一杯を無料で試飲することができます。また、リヴェリアをはじめ、デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンのラインアップを会場内に展示。気になる製品を見て、比べて、じっくりお選びいただけます。さらに、製品は会場にて購入可能となっており、会場でご購入いただいたお客様には、イベント限定のお得なご購入特典をプレゼントします（特典の数量に限りがございます）。 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューを味わえる、リヴェリアだからこそ可能なコーヒーの新習慣を体感できる特別な2日間にどうぞご来場ください。 「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念イベント 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」コンテンツご紹介 ■デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタおすすめ！リヴェリアでお愉しみいただける15種類のカフェメニューとコーヒー豆とのペアリングメニューのご紹介とタッチアンドトライ。 デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタの石井護氏がおすすめするリヴェリアでお愉しみいただけるカフェメニューとムセッティ社*の5種類のコーヒー豆とのペアリングメニューをご紹介する展示を行います。展示するムセッティ社の5種類のコーヒー豆の香りを実際に香って楽しんでいただきながら、ご自身のお好みやコーヒーの奥深い世界を探求することができます。また、タッチアンドトライコーナーにて、実際にマシンを操作してお好きなメニューをご試飲いただくことができます。リヴェリアならではの幅広いカフェメニューを手軽に味わうコーヒーの新習慣をぜひご体感ください。 ※ムセッティは、1934年にイタリア ピアチェンツァで創業した老舗ロースター。20カ国以上のコーヒー豆を吟味し、イタリアの伝統的製法を重んじた焙煎システムで、厳選されたブレンドを提供している。 ■本イベント限定アイテム！デロンギ オリジナル トートバッグをプレゼント*！ 会場でアンケートにご回答いただくと、コーヒーの麻袋をイメージしたデロンギオリジナルトートバッグをプレゼントします。この二日間だけの限定アイテムです。 *数量に限りがございます ■人気のデロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンが一堂に！ 全自動コーヒーマシンの中から、リヴェリアをはじめとする人気機種を会場内に展示致します。人気の全自動コーヒーマシンを実際に見て、比べて、じっくりお選びいただける絶好のチャンスです。気になる製品は会場でお得に購入することも可能です。 イベントおよびプレゼントの内容はやむを得ない事情により予告なく変更することがございます。あらかじめご了承ください。 ■イベント開催概要 ●名称：「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン新製品 発売記念イベント 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの 新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」 ●日時：2025年4月26日（土）・27日(日) 11時～19時 ●場所：六本木ヒルズ ヒルサイド 2F ヒルズカフェ/スペース ●住所：東京都港区六本木6丁目10-1 ●参加費用：無料 ●参加方法：当日参加 【 製品情報 】 製品名： デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン 型式番号：EXAM44055G EXAM44055BG EXAM44035B 本体色：ペブルグレー(EXAM44055G) サンドベージュ(EXAM44055BG) オニキスブラック(EXAM44035B) 希望小売価格：オープン ペブルグレー：商品サイトはこちら サンドベージュ：商品サイトはこちら オニキスブラック：商品サイトはこちら デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、ビックカメラ、ヨドバシカメラ、デロンギ直営店（表参道店）とデロンギ公式オンラインショップ、デロンギ公式楽天市場店、デロンギ公式Yahoo! ショッピング店とAmazonでお求めいただけます。 デロンギ ― 進化し続けるブランド ― デロンギ（De’Longhi）は、20世紀前半より、イタリア北部の街トレヴィーゾでクラフトマンワークショップ（職人の作業場）としてスタートしたイタリアの家電ブランドです。1974年に、最初の電気機器であるオイルヒーターを製造し、工房から工場へと飛躍的に発展を遂げました。1990年代には、暖房器具の製造で使われる技術を用いて、コーヒーマシンの開発・製造にも参入。コーヒー市場に積極的に新しい製品を投入し続け、現在、全自動コーヒーマシンをはじめとするコーヒーマシン市場において世界的トップシェアを誇ります。 ブランドスローガン「Better Everyday」について 「Better Everyday」は、 2011年から続くデロンギのブランドスローガンです。消費者のニーズや時代に合わせて製品は少しずつ変化しながらも、根底にあるこの想いは変わらず守り続けています。 「Better Everyday」は、デロンギがお客様へ提供したい「家で過ごす時間をより愉しく、心地よいひとときに変える」というブランド・コンセプトを体現しています。人々の日常に寄り添うというコンセプトと、より豊かな時間をもたらすという想いがこめられており、製品設計の際にもこの考えを大切にしています。デロンギ製品を使うお客様が、毎日、より心地よく、より充実した、より愉しめる暮らしへ。まさに、「より良い毎日へ」というコンセプトです。 ■デロンギ・ジャパンについて デロンギ・グループの日本法人の「デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社」は1995年に設立。主な事業は、日本市場向け家庭用・業務用電気製品の輸入販売となり、以下分野の商品・付帯サービスを取り扱っています。 1. オイルヒーター、マルチダイナミックヒーター、パネルヒーター、ファンヒーター等の暖房機器および空気清浄機付きファン。 2. 全自動コーヒーマシン、エスプレッソ・カプチーノメーカー、ドリップコーヒーメーカー等のコーヒー機器。 3. ハンドブレンダー、フードプロセッサー、コンベクションオーブン、電気ケトル等の小型調理家電製品。 主力商品であるオイルヒーターは、2004年以来20年間、日本市場において販売台数・売上No.1※１の地位にあり、多くのお客様から支持され続けています。コーヒー機器分野でも、日本だけでなく世界各国でコーヒーメーカー売上No.１※2を獲得しており、優れた機能だけでなく、洗練された美しいデザイン性を備えたデロンギ製品は、世界の国と地域で愛されています。 ※1 独立調査機関調べ 2004年1月～2023年12月 日本国内数量・金額シェア ※2 独立調査機関調べ 2023年1月～12月 このプレスリリースには、 メディア関係者向けの情報があります メディアユーザーログイン 既に登録済みの方はこちら メディアユーザー新規登録 無料 メディアユーザー登録を行うと、企業担当者の連絡先や、 イベント・記者会見の情報など様々な特記情報を閲覧できます。 mentions.title: 34 Products Millennials Would Probably Tell Gen Z To Get For Their First Place
mentions.content: Millennial-Approved First Home Products For Gen Z BuzzFeed Shopping logo BuzzFeed Shopping logo Search Gift Guide Beauty + Personal Care Fashion Home Sports + Fitness Stores Tech Kids Pets Sex Toys View All We hope you love our recommendations! Some may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Just FYI, BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. Posted on Apr 14, 2025 Subscribe to Shopping Newsletter Caret Down 34 Products Millennials Would Probably Tell Gen Z To Get For Their First Place Here's to herb keepers, sink plungers, standing weeders, and all the other products that make living life a little easier. by Mallory Mower BuzzFeed Staff Facebook Pinterest Link 1. A silicone clip-on strainer that's dishwasher-safe, attaches to any size pot or pan, and is designed to save a bunch of space in your kitchen when post-college life hits you hard and you realize your paycheck is *not* getting you an apartment with...an actual kitchen. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is easy to use and now that I’ve had it a few weeks, I don’t know how I have lived without. Makes draining anything in water so much easier! Highly recommend." — Melissa L. Get it from Amazon for $9.48+ (available in 17 colors). 2. A pair of outlet lights so you can give your landlord's special apartment an effortless glow-up. You could even say this space-saving solution is, ahem, lit . Amazon Promising review: "I don't like night lights because they take up the wall outlet, so this was the perfect solution. I put it in the guest bath and at night with the bathroom door open this provides just enough light to guide a person to the bathroom without blinding them . I ended up putting two on my hallway switches as well. What a great product." — LMK Get it from Amazon for $22.98 (available in three sizes and colors). 3. A pumice cleaning stone for saving your toilet bowl from a bleak existence now that you're old enough to, well, legally drink. Over 18,000 reviewers have given this a 5-star rating for getting rid of their harsh hard water stains from rust, lime, and calcium — sans any harsh chemicals. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have very hard water that leaves hard-water buildup and nasty stains. It’s embarrassing to have guests over because the toilets are so gross! I have tried so many products and cleaning solutions — from natural essential oils to harsh chemicals so strong I was lightheaded for the rest of the day. Well, I tried out this pumice stone after reading about it in a BuzzFeed article, and honestly the hype is real! It does take some elbow grease, but the after picture is from only 20 minutes of scrubbing, light enough that I didn’t break a sweat! The stone does get used up, but I think this one should last me a couple of years at least. So if you have embarrassing toilets, try this! " — Stephanie Ray Get it from Amazon for $9.26 (available in multiple pack sizes). 4. A set of reusable microfiber mop pads so you don't have to worry about running out of disposable pads right when you need them most. Save some time and money with these extra-thick microfiber versions! Oh, you haven't thought about any type of mop pad even once in your life? Welcome! Let us show you around. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com They can be used wet or dry and on basically every type of flooring and even drywall if you're so inclined. Since they can be thrown in the wash, one microfiber pad can replace up to 100 single-use pads. Promising review : "Just used these for the first time with my Swiffer WetJet , and I gotta say I am impressed! Went on easily and cleaned the floors easily! I always hated the one-time-use pads and never felt like they got my floor clean. This review is NOT sponsored, I bought these with my own money because I’m sick of single-use products. Seriously, buy these now!!! " — AKGross Get a set of two from Amazon for $10.95 . 5. A bottle of Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator , a fan-favorite among pet parents, this odor-eliminating spray is gonna lift stains from carpet and furniture while *also* pulling out the odor that is often left behind. Don't lose your rental deposit because of Lucky's lack of house training; learn from our mistake. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Angry Orange is a small biz that was founded in 2014. They provide pet-related household cleaning supplies like stain removers, mops, and more. Promising review: "This product is amazing!!!! We have a Rottweiler pup and a Bichon pup, and our house was feeling the PAIN! I tried everything and used to tell my wife, 'With all the science and technology in the world, we still can’t come up with something that gets rid of the dog mark smell!' This product does everything and more. Just ordered another round. We were about to throw away some furniture due to the smell, and now, after use, we can keep it. Saved me hundreds. Well worth the money. " — clayton s tonkin Get it from Amazon for $17.96+ (available in two sizes and in multipacks). 6. A versatile veggie chopper that'll help you prep (and clean up!) with speed that feels downright magical. The interchangeable blades just pop out, then just throw them right into the dishwasher. It's time to say "goodbye" to fast food and start making your own food...fast. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Makes life so much easier. I can't imagine chopping onions or bell peppers by hand anymore, and it does so much more. This requires very little effort to cut through the food and it has a generous container." — Amazon Customer Get it from Amazon for $22.99+ (available in four styles and three colors). 7. A ChomChom pet hair remover roller to pick up fur and lock it inside the roller so that cleanup is a breeze and it doesn't lose its effectiveness with heavy use. We love our pets but woof, shedding is their greatest skill. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have a golden retriever and the shedding is out of control. My fabric sofa is constantly covered in hair and I finally decided to try this after reading an article about popular TikTok products. The reviews do not lie, this thing works magic!! I wish I had taken a before and after picture because the difference is noticeable. I watched the video tutorial before I tried it to ensure I was using it properly and everything he says is true, you do really have to put your arm to work with vigorous back-and-forth movement! However, I find it's a great arm workout and it works wonders." — Joanne Ertel Get it from Amazon for $23.99+ (available in three colors). 8. An herb keeper that'll prevent your refrigerator from becoming a graveyard for well-intentioned grocery purchases. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This product is designed to be perfect for its usage. Herbs stay fresh and visible. Plus, it is beautiful looking. So much better than using a drinking glass." — zerg4 Get it from our Goodful line on Amazon for $19.99 . 9. A stuffed waffle maker — this applause-worthy appliance is designed with a deep, bowl-like griddle which allows you to cook the batter with fillings (we're talking chocolate, fruit, cheese, meat...the works). Upgrade your morning routine from frozen waffles to a homemade meal that'll look straight off a "best of" brunch menu. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought this after I saw a video on TikTok, so I had an idea about the yummy waffles I could make. First waffles were stuffed with apple pie filling. Second ones scrambled eggs with bacon and cheese . Just amazing!!! The only way you could make this better is to send a chef!! I definitely recommend watching a video on TikTok or YouTube to inspire you before you start!!" — Adirondackdarling Get it from Amazon for $49.99 . 10. A bottle of Better Life all-natural tile and tub cleaner that'll banish soap scum, mold, mildew, rust, and hard-water stains from the tired, worn-down tiles in your "new" place. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review : "I have an old shower/bathtub. I tried name-brand shower cleaners and bleach to try and clean the soap scum off the tiles and tub. I had no luck and I would cough and get sick because of how strong the smell was. I thought I would try this to save my lungs. I sprayed my entire shower and left it for about 15 minutes. I came back and rinsed off the walls and they were shiny! I've never had such a clean shower. The smell is amazing and subtle. All I smell is tea tree and it didn't affect me at all. The price is also a good deal since the bottle is pretty large. It came with the sprayer separate and the bottle sealed so it wouldn't leak in the box. I highly recommend this." — Amber Erwin Get a two-pack from Amazon for $15.99 . 11. A hidden fly trap you just plug into an outlet when you have flies, fruit flies, moths, or gnats crawling around. The little light lures bugs by up to 400 feet (!!!) and the sneaky design means this thing'll be blastin' bugs by the dozen without ruining your room's clean aesthetic. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Check out a TikTok of the plug-in fly trap in action. Promising review: "I can’t say enough wonderful things about these handy little bug catchers! They are simple to use, cheap to refill, and catch a ton of small bugs and flies. I have eight of them now, all around my house! It’s a little gross how many tiny flying insects are around…but it makes me feel a lot better now that I have these!" — Chris H. Get a pack of two from Amazon for $12.99 (available in multiple pack sizes). 12. Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger for those of us who treat the drain in our sink like a black hole, assuming the dyed hair, toothpaste, and skincare that gets in there will just disappear for good. It won't... so grab this and save the pipes from yourself! www.amazon.com Please note how hard I'm trying not to make a Super Mario Bros. plumbing joke right now. Promising review: "Y’all, this thing is amazing! My kitchen sink was completely clogged for four days. I’ve been trying to clear the drain with a different sink plunger that I already had and it didn’t do diddly squat. I was about to give up and call a plumber. Then I decided to order this one and it just arrived… it completely cleared the drain in like three minutes. So then I decided to take it to the bathroom sink that had been draining extremely slow and within a minute, I had the water running so quick and smooth again. I got the small one and it’s the perfect size for kitchen and bathroom sinks." — JNeen Get it from Amazon for $14.99+ (available in four styles). 13. A rice cooker can take the guesswork out of making the perfect bowl of rice. It might be the most used appliance in your kitchen, because you can basically feed yourself for every single meal with this thing. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "I love this product. I've made so many different rices in it. The only thing I suggest is when making rice that might end up sitting in the pot for a while, put some olive oil on the bottom as the rice tends to stick if it's sitting on the 'warm' setting for too long, or add some extra water. The rice cooker is wonderful though. It's a real time-saver. " — Michelle Get it from Amazon for $16.74+ (available in four sizes). 14. A power drill scrubber brush set for power cleaning any questionable stains the last renters left behind. These brushes clean tile, glass, and even upholstery. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "So I kept seeing this item on TikTok and thought, 'heck, why not?' I love this item for deep cleaning, whether it's car mats, shoes, or the shower." — A. Givens Get it from Amazon for $18.95 (available in six styles). 15. A fume-free oven cleaner that'll easily eat up baked-in stains, so you can keep your place from burning down while you make home cooking a habit. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I'm a little embarrassed to write this review; it's been six years since my last oven cleaning. After seeing the results, I couldn't help but spread the word. Sure, it took some beer, a little John Mayer, and a lot of elbow grease, but I got the job done, thanks to this handy little product. It did require two treatments; however, given the circumstances, this product accomplished quite a feat in just an hour." — William Get it from Amazon for $8.98 . 16. A foaming garbage disposal cleaner to clean buildup out of your rental's sink before your landlord decides to dispose of your deposit. Amazon Promising review: "Saw on TikTok (don’t judge) and automatically added to cart. So easy to use, takes probably a minute to fully bubble up and clean, and you’re left with a clean sink! I use with other drain cleaning products, but would 100% recommend for weekly maintenance." — Jessica Hamilton Get a four-pack from Amazon for $3.22 . 17. An odor-neutralizing candle that'll rid your place of the smells your fur child leaves behind, rather than just covering them up with some frilly florals. www.amazon.com , Mallory Mower / BuzzFeed I'm in a small apartment with multiple litter boxes and two particularly well-fed cats. These candles were recommended to me by a coworker when I brought up the stress of keeping my place smelling fresh. I get each new scent every season, because they are the only thing I need to keep my home from smelling like pets. I firmly believe they are the best odor control around. Promising review: "This successfully eliminates pet and other odors. It's in a beautiful container. It's easy to maintain. I will always have one in my home. This product is the miracle pet owners have been waiting for. " — Daniel Get it from Amazon for $23.99 (available in multiple scents and packs). 18. A window fly trap to get rid of pesky house flies in an efficient and sanitary way now that spring is bringing back the bugs. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Gross yet effective. We live in the country with animals so we have lots of flies. I did not want to hang a fly trap but caved when I saw this. I feel it’s not as noticeable as others and is easy to hide and works very well. Easy to hang and does not leave a sticky residue when removed." — Tina Get a pack of 12 pieces from Amazon for $7.99 . 19. A Tubshroom that'll keep your drain clog-free fur ever. www.amazon.com Promising review: "Can't say enough good things about this product. I have a family of four and would frequently have to snake our shower drain, it appears I won't be having that problem ever again. I even give my dog baths and this collects the hair. It does not seem to slow down the flow of water down the drain significantly. I'm very impressed having been using around a month. You don't know how much hair you wash down your drain until you use this!" — Aaron Morlock Get it from Amazon for $12.95+ (available in six colors). 20. An extendable microfiber duster set , because your high ceilings makes your new apartment a great place to live , but a rather difficult place for your short self to dust . Amazon This includes an adjustable handle that extends from 24 to 49 inches, a regular short handle, a fluffy duster, and a bendable chenille and microfiber duster. Promising review: "Perfect for my needs. Love the telescoping design and that it has no protruding joints that would prevent it from fitting underneath furniture with low clearance. Reaches under, behind and around all the tight spaces I can't get to without moving heavy furniture around. The duster is also very lightweight and can handle delicate situations." — Sjay Get it from Amazon for $18.95+ (available in two set sizes). 21. A jar of The Pink Stuff (the internet's favorite cleaning product) that'll clean everything from pots and pans to blotches in your bathtub. Move over firefighters, I want a calendar of THIS sexy stuff and its shiny results. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I used this product for my stove because it's one thing I dislike cleaning. I have used multiple degreaser sprays and they all are so toxic and don't work for me. The Magic Eraser was okay but I used several at a time and I had to scrub so hard . But this product oh my goodness, legit a miracle. It doesn't have any type of smell . I put the paste on a cloth, clean the area then wipe it off with a damp cloth and voilà, magic!" — May Get it from Amazon for $5.97 . 22. A microwave cleaner — it's gonna save your microwave from your messiest leftovers. Bring it on, spaghetti. www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is something I didn't believe until I tried it. All it took was a quick swipe with a paper towel and GONE. It loosened everything, and it was sooo white once cleaned!! I would buy these as gifts." — JDesmond Get it from Amazon for $8.89+ (available in four colors). 23. A set of vacuum storage bags so you can stow away your entire winter closet when the sun shines down on us again, instead of shoving it all into a garbage bag on your closet floor. So long, sweater weather! www.amazon.com Promising review : "THESE ARE LIFE-CHANGING. They even give you a hand pump to use in case you're taking the bags camping or just don't have a vacuum handy. I tested the pump to see how well it works, and it worked perfectly! Works just as well as a vacuum, just takes a little more effort pumping out the air. Using these bags, I got half my closet back! I used three bags to store ALL THE items in my closet including three large pillows and several thick blankets and comforters. I will most definitely be buying more; these are fantastic!!!" — Knastay Get a six-pack from Amazon for $19.99+ (available in five size options and three quantities). 24. A quilted chenille floor pillow that'll help if you're in an apartment so small, "furniture" is a word that needs a little wiggle room...because your place has none at all. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This comes just as pictured and described. It is comfortable and looks luxurious. It's great for floor seating." — AKhan Get it from Amazon for $33.99 (available in eight colors). 25. A microfiber dusting glove , because microfiber is the very best material to use when picking up pesky dust particles, and you're gonna see why when you use this! Whoever thought to turn a cleaning cloth into a glove is a true genius. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "Do you hate having to dust around things? I know I do. This glove is ideal — you can just wipe away dust while easily maneuvering around odds and ends in your way. Because it’s your own hand inside the glove it’s also easy to maneuver over oddly shaped things like silk plants or blinds. I absolutely recommend this!" — Clever_Collectors Get it from Amazon for $14.89 (available in two styles). 26. A standing weeder with three steel claws that grip weeds and roots so you can pull them out while standing. There's no need to bend down all day while pulling out weeds in your new yard! www.amazon.com This is made with a bamboo handle and powder-coated steel. The simple lever system is what makes pulling weeds with this so easy! Promising review: "Oh my god, I friggin' love this tool. I bought this on a whim given we bought our first house and know nothing about caring for a yard. Boy has it come in handy. Our new house had a ton of weeds in the front yard and this tool helped me get most of them out in no time. In fact, the process of yanking out the weeds was strangely satisfying! I don't think anyone can say that weeding is fun but this tool made it as close to fun as you can get , especially when you see a long root along with the weed you pulled." — JG Get it from Amazon for $39.97 . 27. A 10-piece mixing bowl set to use as mixing bowls, serving dishes, leftover containers, and the family popcorn bowls. I own these and have told my whole family to get them. You Gen Zers were next on my list! Get them. Amazon, Mallory Mower / BuzzFeed I bought these bowls after a coworker found them (oh yeah, I'm totally a sucker for BuzzFeed shopping posts) and I can't help but rave about them! They all nest easily, which makes storing simple in my tiny Brooklyn kitchen, and the lids are a major bonus for storing leftovers. They're also practically indestructible – my cat has knocked these off the counter as a set and individually (he's a monster) and they've held up great! Get it from Amazon for $37.99 (available in two styles). 28. A Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamp that'll be easy peasy to put on *and* makes cleaning your toilet simpler than it's ever been! Mostly because, with this, you won't be the one cleaning your toilet. Scrubbing Bubbles / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ie8Pubca84E, Scrubbing Bubbles Promising review: "I was sooo skeptical and was confused about how they’d work but the gel solidifies and with every flush, suds wash through with the water and it really makes a fresh difference . Also the scent is light but really nice and fresh! I recommend these 100%! They’re super interesting but they do the job." — Janet Get six stamps from Amazon for $4.67 . 29. An ultra-thin socket cover with an attached six-plug power strip you can use if you'd prefer your furniture actually be directly against the wall, thank you very much. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This product is awesome! We bought one in the office to stop a nearby chair from continuously hitting the outlet plugs. It solved the problem right away. So we ordered three more to use anywhere there is bulk on the wall. It saves space, makes arranging furniture and desks easy, it's clean looking. Someone is a genius. Thanks so much!" — Jay Get it from Amazon for $22.95+ (available in four styles and two sizes). 30. A door draft stopper that'll be a great choice if the gap under your door is doing its best to suck out all of your AC into the hot, humid hallway this summer. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com This is also great for noise reduction and preventing some critters and creepy crawlies from making their way in. Promising review: " I had a problem with birds and snakes getting in under the screened in porch door. This easily solved the problem. It has held up so far." — Cheryl Ford Get it from Amazon for $9.99 (available in four colors). 31. A can of fire extinguishing spray with a design to spark your muscle memory, because nothing sounds scarier than not knowing how to use an extinguisher when you notice a fire start to spark! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought one for beside the grill, one for beside the stove, one for the laundry room, and one for the car. I think the intuitive, easy to use design is fantastic. We already have the muscle memory for using a spray can. In an emergency, it's so much easier to grab this and use it, and turn a small fire into a non-fire. I don't have time to remember a three step method of fire control when my bacon has gotten out of control on the stove. I'm not a firefighter! I'd really like to have one in every room. Think about it. Isn't it better to immediately contain a small fire than deal with a big one? This could save your life, and your house. " — K. Zander Get it from Amazon for $11.99 . 32. A handy Souper Cubes freezer tray that'll make it ~souper~ easy to store notoriously hard-to-freeze things like soups and sauces. Being able to defrost individual portions of soup has my all-too-adult heart all aflutter. Amazon, www.amazon.com This is BPA-free and dishwasher safe! Souper Cubes is a small, family-owned business that was founded in 2017. They also appeared on Shark Tank ! Promising review: "LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. My freezer is so much more organized now. Gone are the days of having to defrost an entire bag of chicken broth for one cup for a recipe. I now have perfectly portioned 1/2-cup and 1-cup blocks ready to go. They fit easily in freezer bags, take up less space, and make me incredibly happy. There was a lot of attention to detail put into the design and I particularly appreciate the wire inside the rim that holds everything steady — no more worrying about spilling all the liquid on the way to the freezer. Just a fantastic product all around. I purchased this and a cheaper version from another manufacturer at the same time but returned the other product. This one is definitely worth the added cost." — Kate Get it from Amazon for $19.95 (available in three colors). 33. A fast-acting lawn repair formula for when your dog's peeing, playing, and digging inevitably wreaks havoc on your yard. This easy-to-use combination of grass seeds, mulch, and soil amendment is specifically designed to repair pet-induced damage and get new grass growing ASAP. www.amazon.com Promising review : "I used this in the spring to fill out our lawn more, and it worked great! I was worried because I feel like you always hear grass seed horror stories, but I just raked our lawn good, spread seeds all over, and watered it once (sometimes twice) per day and it filled the lawn in beautifully! " — Mariah Get it from Amazon for $16.44 . 34. A collapsible cooling rack so you can have the proper setup when your cookie cravings are greater than your counter space. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is easy to set up, sturdy, and saves counter space! I'm so happy with this purchase." — Sun Family Get it from Amazon for $33.99+ (available in two colors). Reviews in this post have been edited for length and clarity.

mentions.title: Rounding Up Some Recent Copyright Decisions
mentions.content: Rounding Up Some Recent Copyright Decisions - Technology & Marketing Law Blog Technology & Marketing Law Blog Menu Biography Academic Materials Writing Presentations Resources Courses Advertising & Marketing Law Contract Law Copyright Law Internet Law IP Survey Legal Ethics Contact Blogs Tertium Quid Blog Eric Goldman’s Personal Blog About the Blogger Browse: Home » 2025 » April » Rounding Up Some Recent Copyright Decisions Rounding Up Some Recent Copyright Decisions April 12, 2025 · by Eric Goldman · in Copyright , Derivative Liability , E-Commerce , Trademark A few recent copyright cases worthy of blog coverage, but not worthy of a standalone post. Omnia Studios Ltd. v. JD E-Commerce America Ltd., 2025 WL 961473 (W.D.N.Y. March 31, 2025) This case involves the service Joybuy, which listed items for sale in Walmart.com’s marketplace. The plaintiff alleges that Joybuy sold counterfeit items, as confirmed by test buys. The court is unclear about how Joybuy operates, but it appears that Joybuy (via the entity “JD”) runs its own online marketplace. As a result, the Joybuy listings on Walmart.com are actually third-party merchant listings with Joybuy syndicated to Walmart. This ruling deals with the 512(c) defense. The plaintiff argued that Joybuy/JD did not qualify as a “service provider” because it was the direct merchant. This is a rare attack on the capacious definition of a service provider, and it did not succeed. The court says that Joybuy sufficiently established that it ran its own online marketplace and thus qualified as a service provider. Shockingly, the plaintiff didn’t contest any of the other 512 elements, so Joybuy defeats the lawsuit. The plaintiff argued that Walmart received direct financial benefits from the listings, so it is disqualified from the 512(c) defense. Rather than address that argument, the court does a switcheroo and says that Walmart doesn’t have the right and ability to control the infringements. This switcheroo doesn’t answer the question on the table, because the 512(c) defense requires the defendant to BOTH not have the requisite supervisory ability AND not have a direct financial interest in the infringements. Showing that Walmart satisfied one 512(c) defense element doesn’t have any bearing on a different defense element. Still ignoring the question on the table, the court explains why Walmart lacked the requisite supervisory ability: Wal-Mart exercised little influence over the activities of its users. As the operator of the marketplace, Wal-Mart allowed users to take the lead on creating listings and thereby selling products—including infringing ones. Wal-Mart’s ability to remove infringing content does not grant it the right and ability to control, nor does its role in screening content as it was listed. The plaintiff also argued that Walmart had red flags of infringement because it was willfully blind. The court says that even if that’s true, Walmart expeditiously removed the infringing items, typically “within a day of receiving the complaint.” The court gives Walmart some grace over the exceptions: Plaintiffs point to only a small number of listings that remained active for longer periods of time, but this seems to speak more to the technical difficulties involved in curating an online marketplace than a sign of willful blindness. As reported by Snukset, these lapses are attributable to glitches within Wal-Mart’s automated takedown system—Plaintiffs have not submitted evidence that satisfactorily disputes this. The plaintiffs also challenged Walmart’s implementation of its repeat infringer policy because it didn’t terminate JD. The court accepts Walmart’s explanation: Snukset explains at length why Wal-Mart did not terminate JD or its marketplaces from Walmart.com: because Wal-Mart knew that JD was “not the actual source” of the infringing products and did not create the listings themselves, that JD had a relatively low number of infringement complaints relative to market volume, and a “lack of evidence of prior notice of Plaintiff’s IP rights.” All of these constitute appropriate reasons why an ISP would refrain from terminating a user. Another act of grace from the court. Having a low number of infringement complaints still would sound like a recidivist to most courts. All told, Walmart gets summary judgment on the DMCA online safe harbor defense. I can’t tell why the plaintiff’s narrative fell so flat before this judge, but I don’t know how repeatable this ruling is. The contributory trademark infringement claim against Walmart goes the same. “The evidence shows that Defendants were on-notice that their marketplaces contained infringing listings—Plaintiff and their agents issued infringement complaints on dozens of such listings. In response to these complaints, however, the evidence shows that Defendants promptly took down nearly all of the infringing listings.” As Miracle Max would say, “There’s a big difference between mostly removed and all removed,” but this court treats them as equivalent. In a footnote, the court says: “Wal-Mart points out that Plaintiffs assert “relatively small levels of infringing sales—Chinn ($311.40), Collis ($2,195.28), Omnia ($170.01) and Turkey ($153.66).” Plaintiffs dispute whether these constitute “relatively small levels.”” Say what? This case involved less than $3k of total gross sales??? That seems like dubious grounds to go after a giant business like Walmart. After II Movie, LLC v. WideOpenWest Finance LLC, No. 1:21-cv-01901-DDD-CYC (D. Colo. March 14, 2025) This is a lawsuit against an IAP for subscriber-caused copyright infringement. The contributory copyright infringement claim survives a motion to dismiss when the plaintiffs allege “that WideOpenWest was notified of over 33,750 specific instances of direct infringement at over 13,000 of its IP addresses, including approximately 100 instances of specific infringements at several IP addresses, yet it did not investigate further or take any action to stop continued infringement by the subscriber accounts associated with those IP addresses.” The IAP argued that Taamneh changed contributory copyright infringement, but that argument was rejected in UMG v. Grande (see also In re Frontier ). With respect to the vicarious copyright infringement claim, the court credits the following allegations: at least one subscriber continued using WideOpenWest’s internet service because WideOpenWest is “amazing on torrents” and the subscriber had “never gotten a letter or notice” despite having “downloaded truly an outrageous amount of data.” That subscriber recommended WideOpenWest to someone else looking for an internet service provider that is “‘less’ strict on downloading.” (Note that nothing in that subscriber’s testimonial refers to copyright infringement. The subscriber could have been celebrating their massive bandwidth consumption, not their massive infringement spree). As a result, the court accepted the inference that “copyright infringement was a draw for WideOpenWest’s customers, and that WideOpenWest reaped some financial benefit, via attraction or retention of accounts, directly from its users’ downloading and distribution of the plaintiffs’ copyrighted works.” As I’ve mentioned many times before, treating IAPs as the deputy copyright sherriffs is bad news for the Internet. For more, see the linkwrap below. Maddry v. Luoxue, 2025 WL 822692 (N.D. Cal. March 14, 2025) The copyrighted work at issue in this case is a card game called “Discernment,” which contains a deck of “made up of cards with biblical or funny Christian phrases” that are garbled and need to be decoded. The copyright owner allgedly got flooded with Chinese knockoffs in online marketplaces that undercut his price. He complained to Amazon, which temporarily suspended the listings. Amazon said the listings would be restored unless he sued the knockoff merchants. He sued the online marketplaces pro se and sought an ex parte TRO for various remedies. His requests are all denied. The court says that it cannot bind the online marketplaces because they aren’t defendants and thus are not reachable via FRCP 65. This goes straight to the heart of the SAD Scheme, where rightsowners keep getting TROs that purport to bind the online marketplaces–seemingly lawlessly. The court says that 512(c)(3) takedown notices are supposed to provide the quick relief he seeks, and the court can’t tell if he has availed himself of that procedure. This is a bit unfair to the plaintiff. 512(c)(3) is a way of disqualifying a defendant from the DMCA online safe harbor, but it’s not mandatory that copyright owners send takedown notices to succeed in court. However, as a practical matter, courts have been skeptical when copyright owners sue intermediaries without trying 512(c)(3) notices first, and that appears to be the case again here. The court also says the plaintiff can discover the identity of the merchants through 512(h) subpoenas, so an ex parte TRO is unnecessary. That’s true, but what about disclosures mandated in the INFORM Consumers Act? The court denies the plaintiff’s request to enjoin the merchants from making listings because the complaint doesn’t provide evidence of copyright registrations. An always-embarrassing mistake, even for a copyright owner proceeding pro se. Lopez v. Meta Platforms, Inc., 2025 WL 965811 (S.D.N.Y. March 31, 2025) Lopez claims copyright and trademark ownership of the “NYC New York Cannabis” logo: Lopez claims Meta and its users used the logo to promote the “NYC Canna Cruise.” The problem is that Lopez doesn’t have a copyright registration in the logo because the Copyright Office refused it under its standard policy against registering logos. The unjust enrichment claim fails because it’s preempted by the Copyright Act. The court doesn’t give Lopez another chance to amend in part because “Lopez is a serial IP litigant who has filed at least 41 lawsuits in this District against more than 100 different defendants.” Selected Posts About IAP Copyright Liability Internet Access Providers Face Contributory Copyright Liability for Subscribers’ Infringements–UMG v. Grande The Supreme Court Didn’t Change Secondary Copyright Liability Standards in the Taamneh Ruling—In re Frontier Internet Access Providers Can Be Contributorily Liable for Subscribers’ Infringements–Sony Music v. Cox Another Rough Copyright Ruling for Internet Access Providers–Bodyguard v. RCN Copyright Plaintiffs Can’t Figure Out What Copyrights They Own, Court Says ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ IAP Defeats Vicarious Copyright Infringement Claim–UMG v. Bright House Data Center Avoids Copyright Liability By Forwarding DMCA Notices to Its Customer–ALS Scan v. Steadfast Another Terrible Copyright Ruling on IAPs’ Liability for Users’ File-Sharing–Warner v. Charter Internet Access Provider Gets Another Devastating Result in a Secondary Copyright Infringement Case—Sony v. Cox Internet Access Provider May Be Vicariously Liable for Subscribers’ BitTorrent Downloads–Warner Bros. v. Charter Are Internet Access Providers Liable for Their Subscribers’ Copyright Infringements?–UMG v. Grande Before Graduated Response, There Was BSA’s “Define the Line” Program. What Happened to It? (Guest Blog Post) The “Graduated Response” Deal: What if Users Had Been At the Table? (Co-Authored Post) Share this: Email Print Facebook LinkedIn Twitter Tumblr Pinterest Pocket Reddit Comments and Pings ← SAD Scheme-Style Case Falls Apart When the Defendant Appears in Court—King Spider v. mentions.title: Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Formula on the Market
mentions.content: Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Accessibility: Skip TopNav Whispeara Under Review: Best Natural Hearing Support Formula on the Market Discover the Natural Formula Backed by Science That Helps Restore Hearing Clarity, Reduce Tinnitus, and Support Long-Term Ear-Brain Health Without Devices or Drugs. April 12, 2025 14:11 ET | Source: Whispeara Whispeara New York City, April 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hearing loss isn’t just an age-related condition—it’s a growing global concern affecting people of all backgrounds and lifestyles. Whether it’s the constant exposure to environmental noise, the long-term effects of earbud usage, or the slow, creeping impact of aging, millions are silently suffering. From asking people to repeat themselves to missing key parts of conversations, the frustration adds up. And for many, the problem isn't just hearing—it’s the emotional toll that comes with it. But there's hope. Whispeara can bring relief and restore the joy of sound. As social situations become more difficult and the feeling of isolation sets in, mental health can begin to deteriorate. Anxiety, fatigue, and even depression can follow when auditory clarity disappears. And while modern solutions like hearing aids promise quick relief, they often fall short of expectations. These devices can amplify sound indiscriminately, fail to address the root cause of the problem, and often come with a hefty price tag. Surgeries and prescription medications present another set of challenges, including high costs, risks, and side effects. That’s why many people are turning to natural solutions—remedies designed to support hearing from the inside out. But the wellness space is crowded, and not all supplements are created equal. Enter Whispeara , a powerful hearing support formula crafted with natural ingredients to help users experience sharper sound, reduced ringing in the ears, and stronger connections between the brain and auditory system. Whispeara stands out because it’s designed to do more than mask symptoms. Its ingredients are strategically chosen to support overall ear health, nourish the auditory nerves, and help fight the inflammation and oxidative stress that contribute to hearing loss. With a growing number of satisfied users, glowing testimonials, and rising popularity, Whispeara is quickly being recognized as one of the best natural alternatives to traditional hearing solutions. Its effectiveness is undeniable, and it's time for you to experience it. In this in-depth review, we’ll explore why hearing loss is becoming so common, what makes Whispeara so effective, how it works inside the body, what real users are saying, and how it compares to similar products on the market. By the end of this article, you’ll have all the information you need to decide whether Whispeara is the right choice to restore clarity, confidence, and quality of life. Why You’re Struggling to Hear – Understanding the Root Causes Before delving into the functionality of Whispeara, it’s crucial to grasp the intricate nature of hearing loss and tinnitus. These are not simple mechanical issues of 'old ears,' as commonly perceived. The causes are multifaceted, ranging from neurological interference to cellular inflammation. Your ears often bear the brunt of a breakdown in communication between your brain, nerves, and auditory pathways. The Brain-Ear Disconnect One of the most overlooked causes of hearing problems is a breakdown in the brain’s ability to interpret sound signals. Sound isn’t just heard through the ears—it’s processed and understood in the brain. The brain plays a crucial role in not just receiving sound signals, but also in interpreting and making sense of them. Over time, due to aging, oxidative damage, or toxin exposure, this processing system can become sluggish or distorted. This is why many people with age-related hearing loss say they can hear sounds, but can’t understand them. It’s not a problem with loudness—it’s a problem with clarity. Whispeara plays a pivotal role in addressing this critical disconnect. It supports the neurological pathways that carry sound signals from the ear to the brain. By enhancing nerve communication, it has the potential to restore sharper interpretation of sound and improve speech comprehension in noisy environments. This offers hope for those struggling with hearing issues. Oxidative Stress and Inflammation Every day, your ears are exposed to oxidative stress caused by free radicals—unstable molecules that damage cells over time. This damage affects the tiny hair cells inside your cochlea that are responsible for detecting sound vibrations. Once these cells are destroyed, they don’t regenerate, making prevention and protection critical. In addition, chronic inflammation in the auditory system can reduce blood flow to the inner ear, choke off nerve endings, and hinder the repair of damaged tissues. Together, oxidative stress and inflammation form the silent villains behind progressive hearing loss. Many of the ingredients in Whispeara are rich in antioxidants and natural anti-inflammatory agents. These work to neutralize free radicals and support circulation to the inner ear, creating a more hospitable environment for sound transmission and nerve health. Environmental and Lifestyle Factors Daily habits can also accelerate hearing decline. Loud environments, constant earbud use, poor nutrition, smoking, unmanaged stress, and even dehydration can all compromise ear health. These factors can lead to oxidative stress, inflammation, and damage to the auditory system. Add in factors like earwax buildup, past infections, or exposure to toxins, and it becomes clear that hearing loss is rarely due to a single issue—it’s usually the result of a cascade of damaging influences. What’s worse, the onset is often so gradual that many people don’t realize how much they’ve lost until it’s too late. Conversations become harder to follow, high-pitched sounds vanish, and that faint ringing or buzzing sound—tinnitus—starts to become more frequent and persistent. Whispeara was meticulously developed with all these contributing factors in mind. Its comprehensive formula is designed to support the full auditory ecosystem. From cellular repair and nerve protection to circulatory enhancement and brain connectivity, Whispeara is a holistic solution that instills confidence in both prevention and recovery from hearing issues. Don’t Wait—Grab Whispeara Now for Natural Hearing Support What is Whispeara? A Full Breakdown of the Formula and Its Origins Whispeara isn’t just another generic supplement on the market—it’s a precision-formulated natural hearing support formula designed to help restore auditory clarity, reduce tinnitus, and protect long-term ear and brain health. But what exactly is it? And how did it come to stand out in a sea of overpromising products? Let’s dive into the origin of Whispeara, what makes it unique, and why it’s becoming the top choice for people seeking a natural path to sharper hearing. A Solution Born From Frustration According to Whispeara’s official page, the formula was developed in response to a growing problem: millions of individuals suffering from progressive hearing loss, ringing in the ears, and deep frustration with conventional solutions like hearing aids, medications, or surgeries. The creators behind Whispeara recognized that many of the available options on the market failed to address the root causes of auditory decline. Hearing aids merely amplify sound—they don’t repair or protect. Prescription medications often treat symptoms with a laundry list of side effects. And surgical options, while occasionally effective, are both expensive and invasive. Whispeara, in contrast, was formulated to be simple, non-invasive, and accessible to everyone. It was built on the philosophy that restoring hearing requires supporting the full system—ear, brain, and nerve health—not just amplifying external sounds. This approach is designed to provide relief and comfort to those struggling with hearing issues. A Comprehensive, Multi-Stage Approach Whispeara’s standout feature lies in its multi-layered formula. Rather than focusing on just one element of ear health, the supplement takes a holistic view, providing a comprehensive solution that addresses various aspects of hearing health. This is designed to reassure the audience of the thoroughness of the product. Detoxification : Helps cleanse the auditory system from toxins and oxidative stressors that disrupt inner ear and brain communication. Repair and Nourishment : Delivers essential nutrients to rebuild and support the delicate structures of the ear and auditory nerves. Neural Activation : Enhances brain-ear communication by supporting cognitive clarity and neurotransmitter function involved in processing sound. Inflammation Defense : Includes anti-inflammatory agents to reduce swelling and increase circulation in the auditory system. This full-spectrum support is what separates Whispeara from many single-function hearing formulas that may only target tinnitus or ear circulation. Why Whispeara is Gaining Momentum As more people search for effective, affordable, and natural ways to manage their hearing challenges, Whispeara has quickly become one of the most trusted options available. Its rise in popularity isn’t just due to smart marketing—it’s because the product offers a comprehensive alternative to the limitations of traditional hearing interventions. In fact, the product is often referred to as the best natural hearing support formula available in 2025, thanks to its carefully researched blend of ingredients, its non-habit-forming design, and its commitment to long-term hearing wellness. From individuals in their 40s starting to experience early signs of hearing decline, to seniors who are tired of relying on clunky, uncomfortable hearing devices, Whispeara is proving to be a welcome, empowering solution. And as we’ll see in the next section, the formula behind it is more than just impressive—it’s rooted in science. Order Whispeara Today and Start Hearing the World Clearly Again Inside the Formula – Ingredient Deep Dive At the heart of Whispeara’s success is its carefully chosen blend of natural ingredients, each selected for its unique contribution to auditory health, neurological function, and cellular protection. This isn’t a random cocktail of herbs—it’s a purpose-built formula designed to address hearing loss and tinnitus at the source. This emphasis on purposeful design is intended to instill confidence in the effectiveness of our product. Let’s explore the core ingredients inside Whispeara and the science behind how each one contributes to better hearing, reduced ringing, and long-term ear-brain harmony. The Science of Hearing Support Compounds Unlike standard hearing supplements that rely on just a few generic ingredients, Whispeara combines over a dozen nutrients, antioxidants, and plant extracts. These ingredients work synergistically to protect the auditory nerves, improve blood flow to the inner ear, and reduce inflammation that interferes with sound processing. Key components include: Moomiyo: The Unique Adaptogen for Cellular Vitality Research by Shakirov (2021), Ivanov (2020), and Kolesnikov (2019) has shown that Moomiyo (also known as Shilajit) plays a powerful role as a natural adaptogen with multi-system support capabilities. It enhances immune function, modulates inflammatory responses, and increases physical resilience—all of which are crucial for the maintenance of cochlear health and inner ear function. Within Whispeara, Moomiyo stands out as a foundational antioxidant, uniquely contributing to the detoxification of the auditory system, support for ear canal detox, and reduction of cumulative stress that leads to age-related hearing decline. As a keystone botanical, Moomiyo's deep cellular restoration potential elevates Whispeara above the status quo of ear health supplements. Alpha-GPC: The Cognitive Enhancer for Brain-Ear Synchronization Studies by Kato et al. (2021), Canal et al. (1991), Gatti et al. (2011), and Parker et al. mentions.title: Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package
mentions.content: Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package Hardware 8.5 Epomaker Magforce 68 Keyboard Review: Simplicity, Compactness, & Performance In One Package Muhammad Zuhair • Apr 12, 2025 at 02:08 PM EDT • Copy Shortlink Epomaker Magforce 68 Price $159.99 There's no doubt in the fact that Epomaker is a leading keyboard manufacturer, offering one of the best product lineups, ranging from full-sized keyboards, all the way to 65% designs, and they manage to nail every single one of them. Now, with Epomaker's Magforce 68, the company has been able to integrate compactness, design, and quality all in a single package, and this particular keyboard is what I would call one of the best options out there if you are looking for something "small." Epomaker Magforce 68 - Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro Switches, Hall Effect Technology & Speedy Type-C Connection Well, in the keyboards segment, there are really many 65% layout options that are said to be something a hardcore gamer would prefer, and Epomaker probably had these in mine before designing the Magforce 68. For someone like me whose work performance revolves around having a decent keyboard, my experience with this keyboard has been a charm. While the "compactness" hasn't appealed to me much, the typing quality is simply something that I am sure every purchaser will appreciate. Related Story Wedbush’s Dan Ives Thinks Trump Has Taken “The Doomsday Scenario Off The Table” And Tech Stocks Will Rally Come Monday, But One Options Market Veteran Feels “It’s A Crowded Trade” For a quick rundown of Epomaker Magforce 68 specifications, it features the Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro switches, which we'll discuss extensively ahead of time, along with a CNC aluminum body and much more. Here's a summary of the keyboard's features/specifications: Specification Details Brand EPOMAKER Model Magforce 68 Layout 65% ANSI US Layout Number of Keys 68 keys Connectivity Type-C Wired Compatibility WIN Case Material Aluminum Finish Anodized Flex-Cut No Flex-Cut Mounting Structure Top-Mount Plate Material FR4 PCB Thickness 1.6mm Stabilizers Plate-Mount Stabilizer Typing Angle 7 degree Sound Dampening Poron Sandwich Foam, Bottom Foam, Bottom EVA Keycaps Profile Cherry Profile Keycaps Material PBT Plastic Keycaps Manufacturing Technique Double-Shot RGB South-facing, per-key RGB Polling Rate 8000Hz Scan Rate 32kHz per key Latency 0.125ms (USB) Anti-Ghosting N-Key Rollover Keyboard Dimensions 314.5 * 113.9 * 38.6 mm Keyboard Weight 1.5kg Package Weight About 2kg Epomaker Magforce 68 - Unboxing & Close-Up The packaging of the keyboard is undoubtedly creative, as the box features a black and blue-themed design, with the branding at the very front. When you open up the box, there's cushioning on both the top and the bottom, which means that the company has ensured that the unit doesn't get damaged when shipping it across different regions. Inside the box, you get the standard manual, a Type-C USB cable, and a keycap puller, which is pretty standard for every keyboard. You also get extra Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro switches in case a replacement is needed, which might come in handy. When I saw the keyboard for the first time, I started to think about the unit's compactness, since I could almost carry its weight entirely at the palm of my hands. That is indeed the beauty of a 65% layout, since not only does it make portability much easier, but it occupies a little space on your desk, which means that you can use the extra space left for something else. But, you do get void of elements such as a dedicated numpad, so it is more of a consumer choice in the end. Starting with the keycaps come in a cherry profile design, which is the common notion in the segment. They are made out of PBT Plastic, which not only is a sturdy material but also ensures that there are no thumbprint impressions on the keycaps after extensive use, and I did notice this after using the keyboard for several days. Another interesting factor about the Magforce 68 is its sound-dampening mechanism, which uses Poron Sandwich Foam as the main cushion, creating that "crisp" typing sound. Epomaker Magforce 68 - Design Language, Hall Effect Technology & Gateron Magnetic Switches One thing about the keyboard that makes it a bit weird is the design language. The overall vibe of the product is seen as something "minimalistic" and more professional-oriented, but switching on the RGB makes the design layout complicated. Apart from this, the RGB really strikes out when you look at it for the very first time, and a more "diffused" look would have been a better choice, like the Galaxy100 counterpart. One of the standout features of the Magforce 68 is the "Hall Effect" technology, which uses a magnetic field to detect keystrokes, providing a smoother and quieter experience. Here's how Epomaker describes it: This feature allows users to fine-tune the actuation distance, catering to specific gaming or typing preferences. The Snap Tap function ensures rapid keystroke registration, while the Dead Zone adjustment eliminates unintended inputs, providing unparalleled control. This level of customization, powered by magnetic switches, ensures that every keystroke is accurate and consistent, enhancing performance across various use cases. So, consumers of different segments could easily fine-tune the actuation distance to get the desired typing experience, which really opens up the Magforce 68 to several types of users. You can utilize Epomaker's cloud adjustment platform to fine-tune the keyboard's performance. Speaking of the onboard switches, the Epomaker Magforce 68 comes with the widely-known Gateron Magnetic Jade Pro, a magnetic linear switch popular for their "cracky" sound, similar to Mahjong tiles clicking together. They come with a travel distance of 3.5mm with a lifespan of over 100 million keystrokes. These switches are primarily used in keyboards supporting the Hall Effect technology and are widely used by a variety of keyboard integrators. Since switches are a personal preference, I won't comment much on them, apart from the fact that if you don't like a "cracky-sounded" keyboard, the Magforce 68 isn't for you. Epomaker Magforce 68 Conclusion - Ideal Option If Compact & High-Performing Keyboard Is Your Need This particular keyboard is one of the best options in a 65% layout segment, but it comes with a hefty price tag of $159.99, which might seem justified if you look at the specifications alone. If you are eager to purchase the Epomaker Magforce 68, you can refer to the company's official website here and enjoy a great experience. 8.5 WCCFTECH RATING The Epomaker Magforce 68 is a great option for consumers looking for a compact keyboard option that features a great typing experience. Combined with the Hall Effect technology, the Magforce 68 is suited for many consumers out there. Pros Compact Form Factor High-Quality Gateron Switches Hall Effect Technology Minimal Design Extensive Customization Cons High Pricing Wired Connectivity Buy for from Amazon The links above are affiliate links. As an Amazon Associate, Wccftech.com may earn from qualifying purchases. Deal of the Day Further Reading Time-Sensitive Deal! Discounted Genuine Windows 11 Pro Key for $14.99! Two Apple Vision Pro Models Are Being Prepared, One That Is Lighter & More Affordable, While The Second One Will Require Tethering But Deliver Zero Latency For Enterprise Apps iPadOS 19 Reportedly Getting A Major Revamp To Make It Look And Feel Like macOS, As Apple’s Tablets Feature Hardware Easily Capable Of Running A Desktop Operating System Dimensity 9400+ Matches The Snapdragon 8 Elite Framerate In Genshin Impact, But Qualcomm’s Flagship SoC Delivers Better ‘1% Lows’ While Rendering The Game At A Higher Resolution Please enable JavaScript to view the comments.

Back to top #6 ranchhand_ ranchhand_ Members 5,719 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: Midwest Local time: 12:16 PM Posted Yesterday, 02:09 PM You asked for an evaluation, but have not detailed exactly you want to use this for, so this cripples any responses. The specs are good, and the Ryzen9 CPU is a top-contender. I have built 2 desktops using the Ryzen7 and 32 gigs RAM and they jet through programs on Windows 11. I am about ready to start a new build using the Ryzen7, that's how much I like AMD. If you are going to use it only for streaming videos, watching movies and surfing the internet to shopping sites, etc. the specs are fine. Note what it is intended for with the amount of RAM that is devoted to graphical interface, about half of the 32gigs. So...if you run heavy duty programs such as video editing & creation, this is going to slow down a lot. I am a bit careful because Amazon lists only 15 ratings, and out of those only 5 users actually posted in with reviews. They claim as follows: " 89% positive ratings from 200+ customers " but I don't see those Amazon ratings. They claim this is a gaming machine. I seriously doubt that, unless childrens', low-overhead games that I am sure you would not be interested in are played. They claim this will run Photoshop. Well, ok, maybe only if it comes with Windows11 (not spec'd) and it will run very slow-w-w-w-w. What I don't like is that it appears not to come with an OS, or with one unspecified. Possibly using Linux? That's a deal-breaker for me. Here in the USA Amazon gives a 30-day return period for almost any reason, postage paid. If you have that in the UK then you are pretty safe. Really work the bejabbers out of it immediately to have it prove itself. Honestly, I would pass on it. Edited by ranchhand_, Yesterday, 02:12 PM. If there are no responses to my post for 3 days I remove it from my answer list. If you wish to continue the thread after 3 days please PM me. Back to top #7 six-h six-h Topic Starter Members 450 posts OFFLINE Gender: Male Location: North West England Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Yesterday, 02:48 PM Thanks @ranchhand_ I think my next machine will have an AMD Ryzen cpu but this Amazon offering just gets more vague the more you check it out. You have more or less summed up my intended usage, but I do do quite a lot of Photo manipulation with Elements 2019 and some Video work using Shotcut which my current Intel i5 based NUC manages reasonably quickly though I suspect My demands are few since it achieves all I require with only 8GB of DDR4 ! The total confusion around this Amazon offer leads me to believe that it will not be the specification we think it will be. Returning may also be disappointing since we pay the import duty and tax up front and I suspect that may not be refundable. Think I'll wait for something a little less nebulous! I've had several sites blocked recently by Browser Guard which I've visited many times in the past, so I raised a ticket occasionally and MBAM have usually reported back that they have reviewed their site data and sometimes it seems they're safe. I wasn't aware that you could submit a Site Address to Virus Total for a scan, that's really useful knowledge, thanks! I presume you can also do that with Jotti. I take your point and also the advice of @PhillPower2 and will "step away" from that deal! I think I'll wait and see if there are any good deals during the year. Having always had Intel based machines before, I fancy AMD Ryzen are perhaps better value/faster these days. I've lived with this NUCi5SYH machine with 8GB DDR4 which has been capable of satisfying most of my needs despite having the OS Trashed by Microsoft's engineers who Naused up their attempt to create "Libraries" for me and I ended up with two folders with exactly the same content, ...everything that was on the dratted machine! So traumatised was I from doing the original install, I couldn't face doing it again to correct their mistake. That's why I really need my next machine to have W11 preinstalled. Hopefully something will come along before W10 expires that will fit my fairly conservative needs. Back to top #11 PhillPower2 PhillPower2 BC Advisor 3,977 posts ONLINE Gender: Male Local time: 07:16 PM Posted Today, 07:34 AM Hopefully something will come along before W10 expires that will fit my fairly conservative needs. Golden rule when asking for help with a new rig ( or even upgrading ) is to state your intended use and when possible your maximum budget, if we know your intended use we can do some research for you. Being honest I am a bit taken aback about your almost fear of installing Windows, it is far easier nowadays and especially when you think back to the days when you had to slipstream SATA drivers into Windows XP. PSU guidance - 10 stripe - Johnny Lucky - PC Mech - PSU Lemon List Which power supply do you need? Due to differing time zones not all of us can always be around at the same time and on occasion there may be a delay between replies. Please note that I do not respond to members who have previously abandoned - not concluded their earlier topics, the assistance here at BC is 100% free, please use this service and not abuse it, knowing the outcome good or bad is valuable information that we all may learn something from. This comprehensive review is designed to meticulously evaluate the ingredients , scientific foundation , user experience , and business credibility of Alpha Bites. If you're ready to take the next step towards improving your health and vitality, consider giving Alpha Bites a try. II. Understanding the Root of Male Performance Decline Declining male performance is a topic that is often met with silence, yet it impacts millions of men across age groups and lifestyles. The signs may begin subtly: lower energy levels, reduced interest in intimacy, difficulty maintaining stamina during physical or mental tasks, or even a loss of self-confidence. Over time, these issues can become persistent and disruptive, affecting not only personal health but also relationships, work performance, and emotional well-being. The Biological Causes of Performance Decline One of the most common causes of diminished male vitality is the natural decline in testosterone levels that begins as early as the late 20s or early 30s. Testosterone plays a central role in regulating muscle mass, bone density, libido, mood, and energy. As levels drop over time, men may experience a wide array of unwanted symptoms, including fatigue, mood swings, decreased libido, and even reduced cognitive sharpness. Additionally, poor blood flow—a key factor in physical and sexual performance—is often linked to sedentary habits, poor nutrition, and oxidative stress. As circulation worsens, the delivery of oxygen and nutrients to critical areas, including the brain and reproductive organs, is compromised. This leads to reduced performance and delayed recovery. Lifestyle and Psychological Factors Performance is not purely physical; it is tightly connected to mental resilience and emotional health. Chronic stress, sleep deprivation, and poor dietary choices create a vicious cycle that further depletes energy reserves and hormonal balance. Anxiety and low self-esteem also feed into the problem, often worsening physical symptoms through psychosomatic responses. Furthermore, many men are unaware that nutritional deficiencies—especially in key compounds like nitric oxide precursors, adaptogenic herbs, and essential vitamins—contribute to poor stamina and drive. The modern diet is often stripped of these performance-supporting nutrients, leaving many to rely on stimulants or ineffective over-the-counter options that do little more than mask symptoms. Why Most Solutions Fall Short The supplement industry is flooded with fast-acting pills and synthetic stimulants that promise instant results but often come with undesirable trade-offs—crashes, side effects, and even hidden subscriptions that trap consumers into recurring charges. Many of these products are underdosed, loaded with filler ingredients, or built on unproven formulas lacking clinical research. What men need is not just a short-term fix but a strategic, natural solution that supports their body's systems holistically—from hormones and circulation to stress resilience and cellular energy. This is where Alpha Bites steps in. In the next section, we'll examine why Alpha Bites Male Enhancement Gummies have rapidly become a trusted product in the male health space, offering a complete and clinically grounded formula that targets the root causes of decline rather than merely covering up symptoms. Claim Your Risk-Free Supply of the Best Male Enhancement Gummies of 2025 III. What is Alpha Bites? A 2025 Innovation As consumers grow more discerning about what they put into their bodies, demand for clean, transparent, and natural supplements has never been higher. Alpha Bites Male Enhancement Gummies are a timely answer to this call, combining the trusted potency of traditional herbal medicine with the convenience of a modern delivery system. Unlike synthetic pills or gimmick-based formulations, Alpha Bites is positioned as a premium performance gummy that addresses the needs of today's man in a noninvasive and sustainable way. A Modern Approach to Male Health Alpha Bites is not just another entry in the crowded supplement market—it reflects a shift toward ingredient integrity, product transparency, and customer-first values. Made in the USA in FDA-registered facilities that follow Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP), this formula is designed with both safety and efficacy in mind. The product is built specifically for men who are: Experiencing low stamina or reduced energy levels Struggling with performance anxiety or diminished libido Seeking a clean and natural testosterone support option Wanting to improve both physical vitality and mental clarity These gummies were formulated to support testosterone production, promote nitric oxide levels for better blood flow , and deliver targeted nutrients that aid endurance, recovery, and sexual health. Alpha Bites' soft chew format increases compliance and consistency, ensuring that users are more likely to stay on track with daily supplementation. The formula also allows for faster absorption compared to hard pills, meaning active compounds get to work more efficiently. For men hesitant to try enhancement products due to the stigma surrounding male performance supplements, Alpha Bites offers a discreet and approachable entry point. There are no harsh stimulants, artificial fillers, or pharmaceutical-grade chemicals—just a selection of time-tested herbal extracts and essential nutrients that support male health from multiple angles.
